description: Allows updating various attributes of a container in a single custom function. Any attributes of a container not listed can be updated via the input_json parameter.

inputs.description: Supports a container id or container dictionary
inputs.name: container_input

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change container name
inputs.name: name

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container description
inputs.name: description

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container label
inputs.name: label

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container owner. Accepts a username or role name or keyword "current" to set the currently running playbook user as the owner.
inputs.name: owner

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container sensitivity.
inputs.name: sensitivity

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container severity.
inputs.name: severity

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container status.
inputs.name: status

inputs.description: Optional parameter to change the container tags. Must be in the format of a comma separated list.
inputs.name: tags

inputs.description: Optional parameter to modify any extra attributes of a container. Input_json will be merged with other inputs. In the event of a conflict, input_json will take precedence.
inputs.name: input_json
